{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10321v1", "title": "Indecomposable bundles on Cartesian products of odd projective spaces", "summary": "In this paper we construct indecomposable vector bundles associated to monads
on Cartesian products of odd dimension projective spaces. Specifically we
establish the existence of monads on
$(\mathbb{P}^1)^{l_1}\times\cdots\times(\mathbb{P}^{2n+1})^{l_m}$. We prove
stability of the kernel bundle and prove that the cohomology bundle is simple.
We also prove the same for monads on
$(\mathbb{P}^n)^2\times(\mathbb{P}^m)^2\times(\mathbb{P}^l)^2$ for an ample
line bundle
$\mathscr{L}=\mathcal{O}_X(\alpha,\alpha,\beta,\beta,\gamma,\gamma)$.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-04-14T15:30:09Z"}
